apis.title: Get Payments
apis.description: Retrieves records of automated payments for a shop based on a specified date range.

apis.title: Get Statements
apis.description: Retrieves the statements generated for a shop and the key statement information based on a specified date range or payment status.

apis.title: Get Transactions by Order
apis.description: Retrieves the transactions associated with an order, including both order-level and SKU-level transactions.

apis.title: Get Transactions by Statement
apis.description: Get a list of transactions based on statement_id for UK and US local sellers.

apis.title: Get Unsettled Transactions
apis.description: Retrieve unsettled transactions generated by a seller, with a detailed fee breakdown.

apis.title: Get Withdrawals
apis.description: Get the list of withdrawal records for a seller based on a specified date range.

apis.title: Batch Ship Packages
apis.description: Batch ship packages by providing multiple package IDs. Available for TikTok Shipping and Seller Shipping.

apis.title: Confirm Package Shipment
apis.description: Warehouse service provider API to give shipment info for an order (for certified providers).

apis.title: Create First Mile Bundle
apis.description: Create a first-mile bundle by combining multiple packages to TikTok Shop warehouse.

apis.title: Create Packages
apis.description: Ship orders/purchase labels (US region). Gets shipping fee and delivery time estimate.

apis.title: Create Return
apis.description: Initiate return requests on behalf of the buyer for full or partial returns/refunds.

apis.title: Fulfillment Upload Delivery File
apis.description: Upload proof of delivery file (PDF, ≤10MB). SOF sellers only.

apis.title: Fulfillment Upload Delivery Image
apis.description: Upload delivery proof image (JPEG/PNG/JPG, ≤5MB).

apis.title: Get Eligible Shipping Service
apis.description: Query shipping services by size/weight (US specific).

apis.title: Get Handover Time slots
apis.description: Retrieve pickup/drop-off time slots for a package.

apis.title: Get Package Detail
apis.description: Returns information about a package, handover time slot, tracking number, and shipping provider info.

apis.title: Get Package Shipping Document
apis.description: Retrieve shipping label/packing slip for a TikTok-shipped package.

apis.title: Get Shipping Providers
apis.description: Obtain shipping provider info for delivery options.

apis.title: Mark Package As Shipped
apis.description: Upload all package data for self-shipped fulfillment (US, UK, ES, IE, IT, DE, FR, JP).

apis.title: Schedule Package Handover
apis.description: Schedule platform pickup/drop-off for a shipping package via API.

apis.title: Search Package
apis.description: Retrieve package IDs based on various filters (creation/update time etc).

apis.title: Ship Package
apis.description: Ship a package using TikTok Shipping or Seller Shipping.

apis.title: Update Package Shipping Info
apis.description: Update tracking number and provider for an already shipped seller package.

apis.title: Upload Invoice
apis.description: Upload invoice PDF (Brazil market sellers).

apis.title: Get Global Attributes
apis.description: Retrieve built-in product and sales attributes for global product listing in a particular category.

apis.title: Get Global Categories
apis.description: Retrieve all up-to-date product categories for global products.

apis.title: Get Global Category Rules
apis.description: Retrieve extra requirements (certifications, charts, dimensions, etc.) for listing a global product by category.

apis.title: Recommend Global Categories
apis.description: Recommend categories for a candidate global product based on its details.

apis.title: Delete Global Products
apis.description: Delete global products and all associated local products at the same time.

apis.title: Get Global Product
apis.description: Retrieve all properties for a global product in DRAFT, UNPUBLISHED, or PUBLISHED status—including mapped local IDs.

apis.title: Search Global Products
apis.description: Search your catalog to fetch a list of global products according to filter conditions.

apis.title: Edit Global Product
apis.description: Edit all the properties of a global product; changes sync to all published markets unless customized locally.

apis.title: Get Active Shops
apis.description: Retrieve all active shops owned by a seller. Check activation status.

apis.title: Get Global Seller Warehouse
apis.description: Retrieve all seller warehouse info (ID, name, ownership).

apis.title: Get Seller Permissions
apis.description: Get cross-border operational permissions for cross-border sellers (pre-listing check).

apis.title: Get Shipping Providers
apis.description: Obtain shipping provider info for delivery options.

apis.title: Get Tracking
apis.description: Fetch logistics tracking info for an order, by order number.

apis.title: Get Warehouse Delivery Options
apis.description: Obtain a list of delivery options from a seller's specified warehouse.

apis.title: Get Warehouse List
apis.description: Fetch all warehouse info (name, status, address etc.) for the seller.

apis.title: Update Shipping Info
apis.description: Update tracking/provider for a shipped order; for self-shipped orders only (must be within platform’s 72-hour policy).

apis.title: Create Conversation with creator
apis.description: Create or get a conversation channel so you can message a TikTok creator.

apis.title: Get Conversation List
apis.description: Fetches the list of conversations with TikTok creators.

apis.title: Get Latest Unread Messages
apis.description: Get unread messages in the last minute. Use webhook/new message listener for real-time notification.

apis.title: Get Message in the Conversation
apis.description: Fetch the message history for a specific conversation channel.

apis.title: Mark Conversation Read
apis.description: Mark all messages in a creator conversation as read.

apis.title: Send IM Message
apis.description: Send an instant message to a creator in the conversation.

apis.title: Get Order Detail
apis.description: Return detailed information about an order—status, shipping, payment, packages.

apis.title: Get Order List
apis.description: Return a list of orders filtered by creation/update time, status, delivery type, buyer, etc.

apis.title: Get Price Detail
apis.description: Get pricing calculation details for an order (voucher, tax breakdown, etc).

apis.title: Order Status Data Exchange
apis.description: Exchange order data between DTC platforms and TikTok Shop for comparison/reconciliation.

apis.title: Quality Factory Order Data Import API
apis.description: Exchange order data (import) for manufacturing/QE comparison between systems.

apis.title: Combine Package
apis.description: Combine multiple packages into a single fulfillment package.

apis.title: Get Order Split Attributes
apis.description: Check if order(s) are eligible for package split.

apis.title: Get Package Handover Time Slots
apis.description: Fetch available time slots for package pickup/drop-off/van collection for a specified package ID.

apis.title: Search Combinable Packages
apis.description: Query for orders eligible for combined shipping.

apis.title: Split Orders
apis.description: Confirm splitting an order into packages (item-level/all-units split as region supports).

apis.title: Uncombine Packages
apis.description: Uncombine one or more orders from a fulfilment package.

apis.title: Activate Product
apis.description: Activate hidden products for sale (goes to Pending/Audit, becomes Activate if passes).

apis.title: Check Listing Prerequisites
apis.description: Checks shop-specific requirements and readiness for listing new products.

apis.title: Check Product Listing
apis.description: Identify any issues with product info in advance of listing.

apis.title: Create Category Upgrade Task
apis.description: Create tasks to upgrade live products from 3-level to 7-level category.

apis.title: Create Custom Brands
apis.description: Create custom brands for your shop and usage.

apis.title: Create Manufacturer
apis.description: Add a manufacturer; returned info is translated to all supported EU shop languages.

apis.title: Create Responsible Person
apis.description: Add a responsible person for EU compliance.

apis.title: Deactivate Products
apis.description: Deactivate in-sale products, hiding them from buyers.

apis.title: Get Attributes
apis.description: Returns built-in product and sales attributes for local shop product listing in specific categories.

apis.title: Get Brands
apis.description: Fetch available brands for your shop, including built-in and custom brands you created.

apis.title: Get Categories
apis.description: Fetch the list of product categories available for your shop.

apis.title: Get Category Rules
apis.description: Returns additional category requirements for listing a product.

apis.title: Get Global Listing Rules
apis.description: Retrieve listing rules for global shops (supported inventory allocation/listing method).

apis.title: Get Global Replicated Products
apis.description: Fetch replicas of products across different regions/markets.

apis.title: Get Product
apis.description: Fetch all properties except those in FREEZE/DELETED state.

apis.title: Get Products SEO Words
apis.description: Obtain SEO suggestions for live product titles (US, UK, SEA).

apis.title: Inventory Search
apis.description: Retrieve inventory info for multiple SKUs or products.

apis.title: Listing Schemas
apis.description: Returns field requirements for creating a product for a specific category.

apis.title: Delete Products
apis.description: Delete unfrozen products that you no longer need.

apis.title: Recover Products
apis.description: Recover Deleted products. Status changes to Seller_deactivated after recovery.

apis.title: Create Image Translation Tasks
apis.description: Initiate translation tasks for multiple images. Async for EU shops.

apis.title: Get Image Translation Tasks
apis.description: Check status and result of specific image translation tasks.

apis.title: Edit Product
apis.description: Full sync edit of a product. Sends for audit unless just price/inventory.

apis.title: Partial Edit Product
apis.description: Edit select fields for a product. Can avoid full re-audit for price/inventory.

apis.title: Update Inventory
apis.description: Update quantity of SKUs for a product currently listed.

apis.title: Update Price
apis.description: Update price(s) of SKU(s). No audit if not in an ongoing promo.

apis.title: Diagnose and Optimize Product
apis.description: Diagnose product optimization issues for visibility, listing quality, and AI suggestions.

apis.title: Get Recommended Product Title And Description
apis.description: Use AI to suggest new title/description for ACTIVATE products.

apis.title: Product Information Issue Diagnosis
apis.description: Diagnose optimization for several live products in batch.

apis.title: Approve Cancellation
apis.description: Approve a buyer's order cancellation request.

apis.title: Approve Return
apis.description: Approve a buyer return request.

apis.title: Calculate Refund
apis.description: Get an estimate of refundable amounts for an order.

apis.title: Cancel Order
apis.description: Cancel an order on behalf of a seller (supports partial cancellation per item in US/UK).

apis.title: Create Return
apis.description: Initiate a return request on behalf of the buyer. Supports return/refund, returnless refund, partial refund.

apis.title: Get Aftersale Eligibility
apis.description: Check eligibility for refund, return, or cancellation for an order.

apis.title: Get Reject Reasons
apis.description: Fetch reason codes required for rejecting cancel/return/refund requests.

apis.title: Get Return Records
apis.description: Retrieve all return records for the shop.

apis.title: Reject Cancellation
apis.description: Reject a buyer's cancellation request.

apis.title: Reject Return
apis.description: Reject a buyer's return/refund request.

apis.title: Search Cancellations
apis.description: Query order cancellation records.

apis.title: Search Returns
apis.description: Query for order return records by filters (create time, update time, status, type).

apis.title: Deauthorize Shop
apis.description: Deauthorize a shop for your app and notify the seller.

apis.title: Delete Shop Webhook
apis.description: Deletes a shop webhook for a specific event topic.

apis.title: Get Authorized Shops
apis.description: Retrieve all shops authorized by a seller for your app (get shop cipher for all further shop APIs).

apis.title: Get Shop Webhooks
apis.description: List all configured webhooks for a shop.

apis.title: Update Shop Webhook
apis.description: Update a shop's webhook URL for a specific event topic.

apis.title: Update Package Delivery Status
apis.description: Update the delivery status of a package from in transit to DELIVERED (SOF sellers, SEA only).
